channel.title: Observatory 3.0 Blog
channel.description: Utilities, progress tracking and task management for the Rensselaer Center for Open Source website.

item.title: Introducing the Observatory3 Blog
item.description:
Finals are just about over, so we're ready to begin work on Observatory3! To get us started, I've created a blog so we can document our progress and release milestones.

Stay tuned for more!
